notFoundPage.description: The page you're looking for does not exist.

heroText.title: Free Information Web Service
heroText.description: Quick access to country information (name, capital, flag, etc.) for developers

completeInfo.title: Comprehensive Information
completeInfo.desc: Complete and accurate information about countries

multiLanguage.title: Multilingual Support
multiLanguage.desc: Display country information in multiple languages including Persian, English, and Arabic

getApiKeyPage.title: Get API Key
getApiKeyPage.loginPrompt: To get the API key, please log in first.

apiKeyUsage.title: üì° How to Use the API Key
apiKeyUsage.description: To use the API, you need an API Key which works like a password and verifies your access to the service. This key allows you to access various features and data of the service, and all requests must be made using it.
apiKeyUsage.whyDescription: X-API-Key is a standard way to send authentication keys supported by many APIs. This method:

whyList.secure: Is more secure than sending the key in URL parameters.
whyList.simpleReadable: Makes requests simpler and more readable.
whyList.recommended: Is recommended by many modern APIs.

apiKeyUsage.howTitle: üöÄ How to Send the API Key in an HTTP Request
apiKeyUsage.howDescription: To send the API Key using X-API-Key, just place its value in the headers section:
apiKeyUsage.securityTitle: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Security Tips for Using an API Key

securityList.noPublicCode: Never put your API Key in public code (like GitHub).
securityList.useEnv: Use environment variables (.env) to store your key.

error.apiKey: üî¥ API Key Missing or Invalid Error :

aboutPage.title: Web Service Description
aboutPage.intro: This web service provides country information for developers. Users can obtain an API Key to access country-related data and use it in their projects.
aboutPage.apiKeyTitle: üöÄ How to Get an API Key
aboutPage.apiKeyDescription: To get an API Key, you need to sign up using your GitHub or Google account. After logging in, you will be redirected to the API Key page where you can receive your key.
aboutPage.goalsDescription: This is an open-source project, and others are welcome to contribute to its development and improvement. The main goal of this service is to provide a simple and standard way to access country information so developers can easily integrate it into their projects.
aboutPage.updatesDescription: This project is continuously updated with new features being added. The development team is always working on enhancing functionality and providing the latest features to users.
aboutPage.dataTypesTitle: üìå Available Data Types in the API
aboutPage.dataTypesDescription: Note that during the filtering process, the API is case-insensitive. For example, when requesting a country by name, values like "IRAN" and "iran" will be processed equally and return the same result.

changeLanguagePage.title: Change language using Accept-Language
changeLanguagePage.description: To change the language of API responses, you can use the Accept-Language header in your HTTP requests. This header informs the server about your preferred language, and the server will return the response in the selected language.
changeLanguagePage.noAcceptLanguageDescription: If the Accept-Language header is not sent, the response language will be automatically set based on the user's system language. This means that:
changeLanguagePage.osLangFa: üü¢ If the system language is Persian, the response will be sent in "fa".
changeLanguagePage.osLangNotFound: ‚ö†Ô∏è If the system language is not recognized or supported, the response will be sent in Persian by default ("fa").

supported-languages.invalid: Invalid language (default country information in Persian)

getAllCountries.title: Get All Countries
getAllCountries.description: This API allows you to retrieve comprehensive information about countries. Details such as the country name, ISO code, flag, capital, dialing code, and geographical location are available through this endpoint.

getWithId.title: Get Country by id
getWithId.request: üöÄ Request to get country by id
getWithId.description: By using the unique id of a country, you can access its detailed information. This information includes the country name, ISO code, flag, capital, dialing code, continent, and geographical location.

getWithName.title: Get Country by name
getWithName.request: üöÄ Request to get country by name
getWithName.description: By using the name of a country (name), you can access its complete and accurate information. This information includes the country name, ISO code, flag, capital, dialing code, continent, and geographical location.

getWithIso2.title: Get Country by ISO2
getWithIso2.request: üöÄ Request to get country by ISO2
getWithIso2.description: By using the 2-letter international code (ISO2) of a country, you can access its complete and accurate information. This information includes the country name, flag, capital, dialing code, continent, and geographical location.

getWithIso3.title: Get Country by ISO3
getWithIso3.request: üöÄ Request to get country by ISO3
getWithIso3.description: By using the 3-letter international code (ISO3) of a country, you can access its complete and accurate information. This information includes the country name, flag, capital, dialing code, continent, and geographical location.

getWithCallingCode.title: Get Countries by Calling Code
getWithCallingCode.request: üöÄ Request to Get Countries by Calling Code
getWithCallingCode.description: Using each country's calling code (callingCode), you can access complete and accurate information about that country. This includes the country's name, ISO code, flag, capital, continent, and geographical location.

getWithNamePage.nameMappingsTitleTable: Change the value of name based on Accept-Language :

howToUseApi.question: How can I use this API?
howToUseApi.answer: To use the API, you must first sign up on our website using your GitHub or Google account. After registration, you will receive a unique API key required to make requests to the API.

howToGetApiKey.question: How can I get an API Key?
howToGetApiKey.answer: After signing up with GitHub or Google, you will be redirected to the get-api-key page, where you can access your API key.

isFree.question: Is this API free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, this web service is completely free to use.

getCountriesInEnglish.question: Is it possible to get the list of all countries in English?
getCountriesInEnglish.answer: Yes, you can get the list of all countries in English.

dataUpToDate.question: Are the data in this web service up-to-date?
dataUpToDate.answer: Yes, the data in this web service are constantly being updated and enriched with more country information.

reportOrContribute.question: How can I report issues or contribute to the API development?
reportOrContribute.answer: You can report issues on the project's GitHub repository or submit a pull request.

supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.description: For any questions or issues, you can contact us using one of the following methods:

feedbackPage.title: Feedback
feedbackPage.intro: Your feedback is very important to us. Please share your thoughts with us.
feedbackPage.loginPrompt: Please log in or sign up to submit feedback.

error.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted feedback today.

validation.invalid: Feedback must be at least 10 characters long and contain no invalid characters.
